title: Can we pray behind a mushrik imam? My friends say he is mushrik but I'm not sure assim al hakeem
transcript: speak up sh my question is about IM I am not certain that he is a mush but my friends that I trust and that I think are knowledgeable say that the IM is mush can I pray behind this IM or not yes you can pray behind him unless you have proof your friend's testimony is not sufficient labeling someone as mush or refusing to pray based on he say is not something that is endorsed in Islam
